user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user login with multi-factor authentication and bank-grade security protocols.
epics.description: Develop and integrate a secure authentication system that supports login using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Ensure all user data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols. Establish session timeouts, password policies, and account lockout mechanisms. Comply with regulatory security frameworks to protect against unauthorized access, fraud, and cyber-attacks.

epics.title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized, user-friendly dashboard to present relevant banking information and product options.
epics.description: Develop an interactive and responsive dashboard that provides customers with a consolidated view of account details, services, and product recommendations tailored to their financial profile. Display quick-access tiles for recent transactions, open applications, and eligible banking offers. Ensure that data displayed is fetched dynamically from backend systems with minimal latency while maintaining security.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
epics.summary: Enable seamless online account opening and modification request processes with minimal manual steps.
epics.description: Design and build guided digital workflows allowing customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services. Incorporate dynamic forms with validation, document uploads for KYC compliance, and automated routing of requests. Ensure customers experience low friction and maximum transparency throughout the submission process.

epics.title: Real-time Notifications and Request Tracking
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and automated notifications for submitted banking requests.
epics.description: Develop a notification management module that continuously tracks the progress of customer requests and provides updates via the portal interface and email. Include push notifications for major status changes such as submission received, under review, approved, or action required. Maintain a user-accessible history log of all updates for reference and compliance purposes.

epics.title: Session Management and Application Continuity
epics.summary: Allow customers to save in-progress applications and resume them at their convenience.
epics.description: Implement a session and state persistence system enabling customers to save partially completed applications, even after logging out. Provide options to resume incomplete applications from any device. Store form data and uploaded files securely while ensuring compliance with data retention policies and system performance standards.

epics.title: Document Upload and Verification
epics.summary: Integrate secure document upload and validation functionalities for supporting banking requests.
epics.description: Enable customers to upload required identification or supporting documents directly within the portal. Implement real-time virus scanning, file type validation, and automatic metadata extraction where applicable. Ensure that uploaded data is encrypted and stored in compliance with banking regulations, allowing back-office staff efficient access for verification.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the digital portal with the bankâ€™s existing core systems and service APIs.
epics.description: Establish a secure and fault-tolerant integration layer between the self-service portal and the core banking system. Handle bidirectional synchronization of account data, transaction records, and application statuses. Implement caching and data replication where appropriate to maintain performance and ensure transactional reliability even during peak loads.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role and authorization management to restrict system access based on user profiles.
epics.description: Develop a fine-grained role-based access control framework to define what actions and data each type of user can access within the portal. Ensure that customers, administrators, and banking staff have appropriate access permissions. Provide audit capabilities for any privilege changes or access violations and maintain full compliance with internal policies and external regulations.

epics.title: Responsive Multi-Device Experience
epics.summary: Ensure consistent and optimized portal usability across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: Design and implement a responsive front-end architecture using adaptive UI frameworks. Ensure that all core features and workflows function reliably across various screen sizes and browsers. Focus on performance optimization, accessibility compliance, and consistent branding, ensuring a seamless experience regardless of the device used.

epics.title: Audit Trail and Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a detailed history of all customer actions, transactions, and system events for transparency and compliance.
epics.description: Implement an audit trail system recording every critical event, transaction, and action taken by the user within the portal. Provide authorized users with secure access to review this history for regulatory, support, and analysis purposes. Ensure that all logs are immutable, securely stored, and adhere to data governance standards.
